header.name: chaos/preprocessor/detection/is_one.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that whether a configuration flag is defined as 1.

macro.abstract: The macro detects whether its argument is defined as 1.
macro.para: This macro detects whether its argument is defined as 1.
The id argument must expand to 0, expand to 1, expand to nothing, or not expand at all. Any other input is undefined.
